civianmod.config.group.items.crateColour: Crates will always show their item count. What colour would you prefer to differentiate them?
civianmod.config.group.items.compactedCo: Compacted items will always show their item count. What colour would you prefer to differentiate them?
civianmod.config.group.items.repairLevel:
Should item tooltips include the item's base repair level?

WARNING: This is NOT the level that will show up in anvils, which is typically the base-level + 2.
civianmod.config.group.items.damageLevel: Minecraft limits this information to advanced tooltips by default.
civianmod.config.group.items.isExpIngred: Show whether an item is an exp ingredient?
Whether you should be prevented from mining blocks if your tool would break.
civianmod.config.group.polyfills.desc: Features intended to fill in the feature-gaps of CivMC.
civianmod.config.group.polyfills.feature:
This will let you click signs entitled [set destination] to set your dest.
 
CivMC (illegal): Must be OFF!

Since ClickDest invokes the /dest command, it's rate limited, or otherwise you risk getting kicked for spam.
 
Each 1000 = 1 second.
